summary: Consume ConvertKit API to manage custom fields, forms, sequences, tags, and subscribers.

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: Select the type of resource to interact with (e.g., Custom Field, Form, Sequence, Tag, Tag Subscriber).

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Choose the operation to perform on the selected resource (e.g., Create, Delete, Get Many, Update).

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the custom field. Required for update and delete operations.

parameters.name: label
parameters.description: The label of the custom field. Required for create and update operations.

parameters.name: returnAll
parameters.description: Specify whether to return all results or only up to a given limit.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return. Must be between 1 and 500.

parameters.name: formNameOrId
parameters.description: Select a form from the list or specify an ID using an expression.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: The email address of the subscriber. Required for adding a subscriber.
